page.title: 03EASTFIELD INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: {EASTFIELD INDUSTRIAL ESTATE},near Penicuik There are 13{factories}on the estate, ranging from large ones like{Edinburgh {Crystal}and{Penicuik Aluminium}to the small{garage}and{blacksmith}.Each factory has a car park and Edinburgh Crystal has an ordinary one and a VIP one ,a landscaped garden and a play area for children. It encourages conducted tours of its premises and includes a shop where it sells its own products.Some of the buildings are very{run down}with messy yards, graffiti and other evidence of vandalism.Some are{well kept}including the heating and plumbing firm in liquidation,with a "For Sale" sign.The blacksmith is expanding into new premises.His old forge is being taken over by an{Indian Restaurant.
